EmailTemplate.name: Nomination of Doctoral Examiners: 2 Victorian Examiners
EmailTemplate.subject: Nomination of Doctoral Examiners: 2 Victorian Examiners
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As we are In progress of ......'s submission it has been noticed that both the nominated examiners are from Victoria. The committee expects at least one doctoral examiner to be from outside Victoria. Can you please provide a statement justifying these two nominees for consideration by our Steering Committee. Alternatively, you can nominate a replacement examiner for one of the two.
Please email me your justification statement or send us a new Nomination form if you are nominating a replacement examiner.
_______________________ ​ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia T: +61 3 990 53009 W: www.monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: www.monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listening….your feedback helps us improve Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
